      • k

        public IntParam k()
        Set the number of clusters to create (k). Must be > 1. Default: 2.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • getK

        public int getK()

      • initMode

        public Param<java.lang.String> initMode()
        Param for the initialization algorithm. This can be either "random" to choose random points as initial cluster centers, or "k-means||" to use a parallel variant of k-means++ (Bahmani et al., Scalable K-Means++, VLDB 2012). Default: k-means||.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • getInitMode

        public java.lang.String getInitMode()

      • initSteps

        public IntParam initSteps()
        Param for the number of steps for the k-means|| initialization mode. This is an advanced setting -- the default of 5 is almost always enough. Must be > 0. Default: 5.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

        public int getInitSteps()
